amendment.description: Amendment requires congressional approval for all rules proposed under the authority of the Affordable Care Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 114-230 to require congressional approval for all rules proposed under the authority of the Affordable Care Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 167 (Roll no. 474).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Smith (MO) amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 242 - 167 (Roll no. 474).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Smith (MO).
